resources.string: A quick hike up to the saddle or a longer hike to the pictographs.
Short in/out easy trail with a great view, particularly when Arches is full
Hiking Map Trail From The House
A great hike through trees with beautiful sandstone formations and a stream that flows alongside of it. Branches off at the end towards Morning Glory Bridge.

This is a sandy hike with streams and beautiful formations. At the end of the trail there is fresh spring water that comes out of the side of the mountain. Note: During higher tides you might get your feet wet, so wear appropriate shoes.

string-array.name: amenitiesDescriptions
string-array.item: Light switch with dimmer on the left, lock box on the right.
Wall maps to help plan your adventures.
First aide kit has everything from aspirin to antacids, and sutures to bandages.
Using the remote, press listen to Music.

Put Dial on high to start cooling down the house. Once it is cooled, switch it to low and set the temperature 2 to 3 degrees cooler than you normally would, even when you are gone. Do not worry, power usage is very low.
Outside the kitchen windows, there is a hose and faucet. Let the water fill the cooler for 5 minutes prior to turning the unit on to prime the pads.

resources.string: Turn cooler on or heat up.
Unplug the camera in the kitchen.
Fold plastic sheets and slide them under the beds or place in the closets.
Wipe down the counters and all surfaces.
Turn the water to the washing machine on, located on the left of the wall.
IMPORTANT: USE THE REMOTE CONTROL! The static electricity can be intense and we do not want to damage the electronics.

array.name: extraInfoOnArrival
array.item: 1st room has a queen size bed and 2nd room has a full size bunk bed.
Towels are located in the hallway closet.
Set your recyclables aside to bring back with you, otherwise there is a small recycling center in town you can sort and drop off glass and paper items.
Scan the wall maps for to plan your trips and utalize the books for hiking and 4-wheeling trails.
When the air conditioner is on, open at least one window 2-3" in the kitchen and livingroom and any additional rooms you want the air to flow to.

resources.string: If you slept in the bed (without a sleeping bag), strip and wash the sheets and remake the bed.
Cover the beds with the plastic sheets.
Close the mountain-side window shades and curtains in the bedrooms.
Turn the cooler system off or the Nest to eco mode.
If you turned the water to the washing machine on, turn it off.
Verify the backdoor is locked (Note: always "unlocked" from the inside and deadbolt only for the front door).
Verify all windows are closed and locked.
Put the key back in the lock-box and scroll the numbers.
